subject: Automobile Racing
Race
Discrimination
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Wendell O. Scott, once barred from some races, is not among the 25 nominees for one of the first five seats in the Hall of Fame.
snippet: Wendell O. Scott, once barred from some races, is not among the 25 nominees for one of the first five seats in the Hall of Fame.
